products.title: Bella Blackout Teal Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Bella is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. A fabulous blue/ green shaded fabric. A classic shade that will stand the test of time within your home. Product id: sdb-vtb1391 fabric colour: teal blue material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes bella blackout teal blue 89mm vertical blind in blue.

products.title: Bella Blackout Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This tiffany blue vertical blind adds a soft splash of colour and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sapphire Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This bold bella blackout sapphire blue vertical blind brings cool-toned beautiful blue to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office.

products.title: Bella Blackout Brittany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This brittany blue vertical blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.
